S06pvspl_u:1_1_0: namas sarvajñāya // evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
S06pvspl_u:1_1_1: sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasrais sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
S06pvspl_u:1_1_2: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanais samyagājñāsuvimuktacittais
S06pvspl_u:1_1_3: sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ pañcamātrair bhikṣuṇīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair anekaiś
S06pvspl_u:1_1_4: ca bodhisatvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir animittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ
S06pvspl_u:1_1_5: kṣāntisamatāpratilabdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akuhakair alapakair apagatajñātṛlābhacittaiḥ
S06pvspl_u:1_2_0: / tadyathā badhrapālena ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ratnākareṇa ca susārthavāhena ca naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca guhaguptena
S06pvspl_u:1_2_1: ca indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇa
S06pvspl_u:1_2_2: ca nityodyuktena ca nityaprayuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamamatinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena
S06pvspl_u:1_2_3: ca mañjuśriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityotkṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena /
S06pvspl_u:1_4_0: / atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhānyā (PvSPL kā_a) abhūvan*
S06pvspl_u:1_4_1: sarvakṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan* ye ca satvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante
S06pvspl_u:1_4_2: sma te devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anusmaranti sma anusmṛtya tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu
S06pvspl_u:1_4_3: buddhakṣetreṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas teṣām antikam upasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pādavandanāṅ kṛtvā
S06pvspl_u:1_4_4: sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā tān buddhān bhagavato namasyanti sma /
S06pvspl_u:1_5_0: / atha khalu tenaiva kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau andhās satvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti
S06pvspl_u:1_5_1: sma vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdāñ cchṛṇvanti sma unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma vikṣiptacittā ekāgracittā bhavanti sma nagnāś
S06pvspl_u:1_5_2: cīvaraprāvṛtā bhavanti sma jighatsitāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhavanti sma tṛṣitāḥ vigatapipāsā bhavanti sma rogaspṛṣṭāḥ vigatarogā bhavanti
S06pvspl_u:1_5_3: sma hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti sma aviratākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvāḥ satvā viratākuśalakāyāvāṅmanaskarmāntājīvā
S06pvspl_u:1_5_4: bhavanti sma sarvasatvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma bhrātṛbhaginī samacittā mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś
S06pvspl_u:1_5_5: ca bhavanti sma brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmagandhāḥ sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśasukhaṃ pratilabhante sma tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya
S06pvspl_u:1_5_6: tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñāya samanvāgatā bhavanti sma yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānam
S06pvspl_u:1_5_7: udānayanti sma sādhu damaḥ sādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇo brahmacaryavāsaḥ sādhu praṇibhūteṣv avihiṃseti /
S06pvspl_u:1_6_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva sihāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ iman trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati
S06pvspl_u:1_6_1: virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha-ūrdhvavidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl
S06pvspl_u:1_6_2: lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca /
S06pvspl_u:1_7_0: / tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvvaparvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā
S06pvspl_u:1_7_1: ca evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca /
S06pvspl_u:1_8: / atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhsaramahāsāhsre lokadhātau satvānām ātmabhāvas tatsamānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa /
S06pvspl_u:1_10_0: lokadhātau śuddhāvāsikāyikā (PvSPL kā_b) devā brahmakāyikāś ca paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca nirmāṇaratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś
S06pvspl_u:1_10_1: ca trāyastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te tan tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā
S06pvspl_u:1_10_3: divyāni ca kesaratamālapatrāṇi gṛhītvā yena sa tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntā ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06pvspl_u:1_10_4: lokadhātau manuṣyās te pi tan tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā sthalajajalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena sa tathāgatasyāsecanaka
S06pvspl_u:1_11_0: / atha khalu te devās te ca manuṣyās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatraddhvajapatākābhis te
S06pvspl_u:1_11_1: sthalajajalajaiḥ puṣpais tan tathāgatakāyam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma /
S06pvspl_u:1_12_0: / atha khalu yais taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatraddhvajapatākāvarṣaiḥ sthajajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān
S06pvspl_u:1_12_1: avakīrṇas tāni sarvāny uparyantarīkṣe bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātupramāṇa ekaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito
S06pvspl_u:1_12_2: bhūt* tataś ca kūṭāgārād divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante sma pralambante sma abhipralambante sma taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ
S06pvspl_u:1_12_3: paṭṭadāmabhiś cāyan trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīva śobhate sma tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena
S06pvspl_u:1_12_4: daśasu dikṣu pravisṛtena ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan* asmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06pvspl_u:1_12_5: lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu lokadhātuṣu devamanuṣyānām* ekaikasyaitad abhūt* mama puratas tathāgato niṣiṇṇo dharman deśayati
S06pvspl_u:1_12_6: mama puratas tathāgato niṣiṇṇo dharman deśayatīti /
S06pvspl_u:1_13_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar api smitam akarot* yena smitāvabhāsenāyan trisāhasramahāsāhasro
S06pvspl_u:1_13_1: lokadhātuḥ sphuṭo bhūt* yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan* ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06pvspl_u:1_13_2: lokadhātau satvāḥ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghāṃs tatra
S06pvspl_u:2_0_0: (PvSPL ki_a) gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye satvās te pīmāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_0_1: sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha-ūrdhvandigbhāge gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_0_2: buddhān bhagavantaḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghāṃs teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye satvās te pīmāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ
S06pvspl_u:2_1_0: / atha khalu pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra
S06pvspl_u:2_1_1: ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānān deśayati
S06pvspl_u:2_1_2: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsan dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālan
S06pvspl_u:2_1_3: tañ ca bhagavato secanakam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tenopasaṃkrānta
S06pvspl_u:2_1_4: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaran tathāgatam etad avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo
S06pvspl_u:2_1_5: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatasyātmabhāvasya sandarśanāya /
S06pvspl_u:2_2_0: / evam ukte sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat* asti kulaputretaḥ paścime digbhāge
S06pvspl_u:2_2_1: gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati
S06pvspl_u:2_2_2: dhriyate yāpayate sa bodhisatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā saṃprakāśayati tasyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_3_0: / atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisatvo ratnākaran tathāgatam etad avocat* gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun taṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_3_1: bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvāṇ
S06pvspl_u:2_3_2: bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāraṅgatān darśanāya sa bhagavān āha gaccha
S06pvspl_u:2_4_0: / atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisatvāya prādād
S06pvspl_u:2_4_1: evañ cāvādīd etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais saparivāras taṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān*
S06pvspl_u:2_4_2: bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghusamutthānatāṃ (PvSPL ki_b) yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatīmāni
S06pvspl_u:2_4_3: ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena nānāratnāmayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni
S06pvspl_u:2_4_4: prahitāni bhagavata iti saṃprajānaṅkārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhaves taṅ kasya hetor durāsadā hi te kulaputra
S06pvspl_u:2_4_5: bodhisatvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_5_0: / atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisatvas tasya ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇāvabhāsāni
S06pvspl_u:2_5_1: sahasrapatrāṇy anekair bodhisatvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitair dārakair dārikābhiś ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_5_2: pūrvasyān diśi teṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu buddhān bhagavatas satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir
S06pvspl_u:2_5_3: yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmat upasaṃkramya
S06pvspl_u:2_5_4: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte 'sthād ekānte sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisatvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam
S06pvspl_u:2_5_5: etad avocat* ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_5_6: ca paripṛcchatīmāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni
S06pvspl_u:2_6_0: / atha khalu bhagavāñ cchākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavas
S06pvspl_u:2_6_1: tena prākṣipat taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan* teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_6_2: dharman deśayanti sma yad utemam eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ yaiś ca satvais sa dharmaś śrutas te sarve niyatā abhūvann
S06pvspl_u:2_7_0: / atha khalu ye te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāś ca dārakā dārikāś ca tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātos samantaraśminā
S06pvspl_u:2_7_1: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sārdham āyātās te svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjya
S06pvspl_u:2_7_2: pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte nyasīdan* ekāntaniṣannāś ca te gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikā bhagavantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_3: śākyamunin tathāgatam etad avocan* ratnākaro bhagavāṃs tathāgataḥ bhagavato 'lpabādhātāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghusamutthānatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_4: yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_5: atha khalu bhagavāñ cchākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmā (PvSPL kham_a) manasikārād evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_6: prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyabhijñājñānasākṣātkriyā dānam abhinirharati sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_7_7: satvān paśyati cyavamānān upapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatān durgatān yathākarmopagān satvān yathābhūtaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_8: prajānāty amī bhavantas satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāgduścaritena samanvāgatā manoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām
S06pvspl_u:2_7_9: apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayas te mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātan narakeṣūpapadyante
S06pvspl_u:2_7_10: amī punar bhavantas satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāksucaritena manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām anapavādakās samyagdṛṣṭikās
S06pvspl_u:2_7_11: te samyagdṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇāt sugatau svargaloka upapadyanta iti divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_7_12: daśa diśi loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvalokadhātuṣu ṣaḍgatikānāṃ satvānāñ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tena ca divyena
S06pvspl_u:2_7_13: cakṣuṣā na manyate tathā hi tac cakṣur acakṣur acintyatām upādāya yo 'haṃ paśyāmīti na manyate sa tad eva cakṣur nopalabhate
S06pvspl_u:2_7_14: svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānutpattikām upādāya sa divyacakṣuścetanām api notpādayati na
S06pvspl_u:2_8_0: śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran divyacakṣurabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati sa āsravakṣayābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam
S06pvspl_u:2_8_1: abhinirharati na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati nāpy anyaṅ kañcid dharmam āśaṃsamāno 'nyatrānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim
S06pvspl_u:2_8_2: abhisambhotsyata iti sa tayā āsravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānābhinirhārakuśalatayā na manyate tathā hi taj jñānam ajñānam
S06pvspl_u:2_8_3: acintyatām upādāya so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na manyate sa tad eva jñānan nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām
S06pvspl_u:2_8_4: upādāya svabhāvopalabdhitām upādāya āsravakṣayajñānacetanām api notādayati nāsravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānabhinirhāracetanām
S06pvspl_u:2_8_5: anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārād evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nāśravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānam
S06pvspl_u:2_8_6: abhinirharaty evaṃ punaś śāriputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carataṣ ṣaḍabhijnāḥ paripūrayante pariśuddhyanti
S06pvspl_u:2_9_0: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhanyanti
S06pvspl_u:2_10: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaś śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā anaddhyāpattitām upādāya /
S06pvspl_u:2_11: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā akṣobhaṇatām upādāya /
S06pvspl_u:2_12_0: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti
S06pvspl_u:2_13: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā avikṣiptacittām upādāya /
S06pvspl_u:2_14_0: / santi śāriputrā bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantas sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti dauṣprajñyacittaparivarjanatām
S06pvspl_u:2_14_1: upādāya evaṅ khalu śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāṣ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā
S06pvspl_u:2_14_2: agamanānāgamanatām upādāyāparigrahatām upādāya tat kasya hetor dānam āgraham upādāya prajñapyate śīlan dauḥśīlyatām upādāya
S06pvspl_u:2_14_3: kṣāntir akṣāntim upādāya vīryaṅ kausīdyam upādāya samādhir asamāhitatām upādāya prajñā dauṣprajñyam upādāya prajñapyate sa
S06pvspl_u:2_14_4: tīrṇa iti na manyate atīrṇa iti na manyate dānaṃ mātsaryam iti na manyate śīlan dauḥśīlyam iti kṣāntiḥ kṣobha iti vīryaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_14_5: kausīdyam iti samādhir asamāhitateti prajñā duṣprajñateti na manyate vindako 'ham iti na manyate satkṛta iti na manyate asatkṛta
S06pvspl_u:2_14_6: iti na manyate tat kasya hetor na hi śāriputrānutpāda ākṛṣṭo 'ham iti manyate na vandito 'ham iti na satkṛto 'ham iti nāsatkṛto
S06pvspl_u:2_14_7: 'ham iti manyate tat kasya hetos tathā hi prajñāpāramitā sarvamanyanās samucchinattīha śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato
S06pvspl_u:2_14_8: bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya ye guṇā bhavanti na te śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyante /
S06pvspl_u:2_15: / imān guṇān paripūrayan satvānś ca paribhāvayati buddhakṣetrāñ ca pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāñ cānuprāpnoti /
S06pvspl_u:2_16_0: / punar aparañ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran sarvasatvānām antike samacittatām utpādayati sarvasatvānām
S06pvspl_u:2_16_1: antike samacittatām utpādya sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhate sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhya tasyāṃ sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarvasatvān
S06pvspl_u:2_16_2: pratiṣṭhāpayati sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca sarvabodhisatvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ sarvapratyekabuddhānāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_16_3: ca priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca sa yatra (PvSPL khaḥ_a) yatropapadyate tatra tatra na jātu cakṣuṣāmanaāpāni rūpāṇi paśyati na
S06pvspl_u:2_16_4: śrotreṇāmanaāpāñ cchabdāñ cchṛṇoti na ghrāṇenāmanaāpān gandhāñ jighrati na jihvayāmanaāpān rasān āsvādayati na kāyenāmanaāpān
S06pvspl_u:2_16_5: sparśān spṛśati na manasāmanaāpān dharmān vijānāti na ca parihīyate sarvakārajñatāyāḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_17_0: / asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne tataḥ parṣadas trīṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavantaṃ yathāprāvṛtaiś cīvarair
S06pvspl_u:2_17_1: abhicchādayāmāsur anuttarāyāñ ca samyaksambodhau cittāny utpādayāmāsuḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_19_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratisthāpya yena bhagavāṃs
S06pvspl_u:2_19_1: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya nāhetukān nāpratyayaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_20_0: / bhagavān āha etāny ānanda trīṇi bhikṣuśatāny ekaṣaṣṭitame kalpe mahāketunāmānas tathāgatā arhantas samyaksambuddhā loka
S06pvspl_u:2_20_1: utpatsyante tārakopame kalpe itaś cyutās santaḥ akṣobḥyasya tathāgatasyārhatas samyaksambuddhasya buddhakṣetra upapatsyante
S06pvspl_u:2_20_2: abhiratyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭiś ca devaputrasahasrāś cāsyāṃ parṣady anayā dharmadeśanayā paripācitāni maitreyasya tathāgatasyārhatas
S06pvspl_u:2_21_0: / atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavataś śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalāc catasraḥ parṣado bhagavato 'nubhāvena pūrvasyān diśi buddhasahasraṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_21_1: paśyanti sma mahatā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyān dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_21_2: paścimottarāyām adha-ūrdhvam ekaikasyān diśi buddhasahasraṃ buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti sma mahatā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhena na
S06pvspl_u:2_21_3: ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti yān daśasu dikṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_22_0: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām // atha khalu bhagavataś śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalād daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ praṇidhānāni kṛtāni
S06pvspl_u:2_22_1: vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāni puṇyāni kariṣyāmo yaiḥ puṇyair eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmahaṃ iti /
S06pvspl_u:2_23_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot* ānanda āha ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_23_1: pratyayas smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya nāhetukan nāpratyayaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitam āviṣkurvanti /
S06pvspl_u:2_24_0: / bhagavān āha paśyasi tvam ānandemāni daśa prāṇisahasrāṇi ānanda āha paśyāmi bhagavan bhagavān āha etāny ānanda daśa prāṇisahasrāṇītaś
S06pvspl_u:2_24_1: cyutāni daśasu dikṣv eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyante na ca kadācit tathāgatavirahitā bhaviṣyanti tataḥ paścād vyūharājanāmānas
S06pvspl_u:2_25_0: / atha khalu āyuṣmāñ cchāriputra (PvSPL khaḥ_b) āyuṣmāñ ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāñ ca subhūtir āyuṣmāñ ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra
S06pvspl_u:2_25_1: āyuṣmāñ ca mahākāśyapa ete cānye ca sambahulā abhijñātābhijñātā bhikṣavo bodhisatvāś ca mahāsatvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāś
S06pvspl_u:2_25_2: ca bhagavantam etad avocan mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavann udārapāramiteyaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān yad uta prajñāpāramitā agrapāramiteyaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_25_3: viśiṣṭapāramiteyaṃ parapāramiteyaṃ pravarapāramiteyaṃ praṇītapāramiteyam anuttarapāramiteyan niruttarapāramiteyam asamapāramiteyam
S06pvspl_u:2_25_5: anamṛdyapāramiteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ caradbhir
S06pvspl_u:2_25_6: bodhisatvair mahāsatvair asamasaman dānan dattan tair asamasamā dānapāramitā paripūritā tair asamasama ātmabhāvapratilabdhaye
S06pvspl_u:2_25_7: samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyās samyaksambodheḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_26_0: / evam asamasamaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryan dhyānam asamasamā prajñā bhāvitā tair asamasamā prajñāpāramitā paripūritā tair asamasama
S06pvspl_u:2_26_1: ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhas te samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yadutānuttarāyās samyaksambodher atraive ca tvaṃ bhagavan
S06pvspl_u:2_26_2: prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann asamasamasya rūpasya lābhī jātaḥ asamasamāyā vedanāyās saṃjñāyās saṃskārāṇām asamasamasya vijñānasya
S06pvspl_u:2_26_3: lābhī jātaḥ asamasamāṃ bodhim abhisambuddho samasaman dharmacakraṃ pravartitavān evam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto
S06pvspl_u:2_26_4: 'traiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambuddhā abhisambuddhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca tasmāt tarhi
S06pvspl_u:2_26_5: bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṅgantukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaṅkaraṇīyo namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_26_6: bodhisatvā mahāsatvās sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranti /
S06pvspl_u:2_27_0: / evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān sambahulān mahāśrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvān etad avocad evam etat kulaputrā evam etan
S06pvspl_u:2_27_1: namaskaranīyās te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ye 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranti /
S06pvspl_u:2_28_0: / tat kasya hetor bodhisatvam* kulaputrā mahāsatvam āgamya manuṣyalokasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavaty evan devalokasya kṣatriyamahāsālakulānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_1: brāhmaṇamahāsālakulānān gṛhapatimahāsālakulānāṃ rājñāñ cakravartināñ cāturmahārājikānān devānān trāyastriṅśānāṃ yāmānān tuṣitānān
S06pvspl_u:2_28_2: nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām
S06pvspl_u:2_28_3: ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām (PvSPL ga_a) apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ bṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisatvānāṃ śuddhāvāsānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_4: sudarśanānām aspṛhāṇām atapānām akaniṣṭhānāñ cākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānām ākiñcanyāyatanopagānān
S06pvspl_u:2_28_5: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānān devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhataṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_6: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya
S06pvspl_u:2_28_7: trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ yad idaṃ buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya
S06pvspl_u:2_28_9: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati yāvat kulaputrās sarvasukhopadhānānān divyānāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāñ ca bhavasukhānān nirvāṇasukhānāñ ca
S06pvspl_u:2_28_10: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati sarvas sa kulaputrā bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya tat kasya hetos tathā hi kulaputrā bodhisatvo
S06pvspl_u:2_28_11: mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran satvān* ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu niyojayati dānan dāpayati śīle niyuṅkte kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati
S06pvspl_u:2_28_12: vīrye niyojayati dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāyāṃ niyojayati bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya satvā dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_13: caranti te dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantas sarvalaukikalokottarās saṃpattīr anuprāpnuvanti tasmāt tarhi
S06pvspl_u:2_28_14: kulaputrā bodhisatvo mahāsatvas sarvasatvānāṃ hitasukhāya pratipanno bhavati /
S06pvspl_u:2_29_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāñ jihvendriyaṃ mūkhān nirṇāmyemān trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuñ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa
S06pvspl_u:2_29_1: atha khalu tato jihvendriyād anekavarṇā nānānvarṇā arciso niścārya pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn avabhāsayamāsuḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_29_2: evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ pi dikṣv adha-ūrdhvāyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn avabhāsayāmāsuḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_30_0: / atha khalu pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisatvā mahāsatvās taṃ prabhāvyūhan dṛṣṭvā
S06pvspl_u:2_30_1: svakasvasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti sma kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam evaṃrūpaḥ prabhāvabhāsas
S06pvspl_u:2_30_2: sandṛśyante te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān evam āhuḥ eṣa kulaputrāḥ paścime digbhāge sahāyāṃ lokadhātau
S06pvspl_u:2_31_0: nāma tahāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tena jihvendriyaṃ mukhān nirṇāmya daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena
S06pvspl_u:2_31_1: (PvSPL ga_b) sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitādeśanāya saṃprakāśanāya te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās
S06pvspl_u:2_31_2: tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhur gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhan
S06pvspl_u:2_31_3: darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca daśadiksannipatitān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān darśanāya tāñ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ śravaṇāya
S06pvspl_u:2_31_4: te buddhā bhagavanta evam āhur yasyedānīṃ kulaputrāḥ kālaṃ manyaddhva evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv
S06pvspl_u:2_31_5: adha-ūrdhvāyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisatvā mahāsatvās taṃ prabhāvyūhan dṛṣṭvā svakasvakeṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_31_6: buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavantaḥ paripṛcchanti sma kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam evaṃrūpaḥ prabhāvabhāsas sandṛśyate
S06pvspl_u:2_31_7: te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisatvān māhāsatvān evam āhuḥ eṣa kulaputrā adhodigbhāge sahāṃyāṃ lokadhātau śākyamunir nāma
S06pvspl_u:2_31_8: tāthāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tena jihvendriyan nirṇāmya daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena
S06pvspl_u:2_31_9: sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitān deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās tāṃs tathāgatān
S06pvspl_u:2_31_10: evam āhur gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun tañ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhan
S06pvspl_u:2_31_11: darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca daśadiksannipatitān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān darśanāya vandanāya tāñ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_31_12: śravaṇāya te buddhā bhagavanta evam āhur yasyedānīṃ kulaputrāḥ kālaṃ manyadhve /
S06pvspl_u:2_32_0: / atha khalu daśabhyo digbhyas te bodhisatvāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākā gṛhītvā nānāratnasuvarṇarūpyapuṣpapuṭaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_32_1: parigṛhītvā mahatyā tūryatāṇḍāvacarasaṃgītyā bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan* /
S06pvspl_u:2_33_0: / atha khalu cāturmahārājikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā divyāni puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamaṇḍāravakesaratamālapatrāṇi
S06pvspl_u:2_33_1: gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāman* atha khalu te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās te ca devās taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanais
S06pvspl_u:2_33_2: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddham avakiranti sma atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi viyad abhyudgamyāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya
S06pvspl_u:2_33_3: lokadhātor upariṣṭhāt puṣpavitānāṃ saṃsthitañ caturaśrañ ca catusthūṇaṃ samambhāgaśas suvibhaktaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ manoramaṃ yat
S06pvspl_u:2_33_4: puṣpavitānan dṛṣṭvā tato bodhisatvamahāsatvaparṣado devaparṣadaś ca prāṇikoṭinayutaśatasahasreṇānutpattakeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_33_5: pratilabdhā ta utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgān kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_33_6: praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocan vayaṃ bhagavann anāgate (PvSPL gā_a) 'dhvany evaṃrūpāṇān dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhavema yathā
S06pvspl_u:2_33_7: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ evañ ca śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pariharema evañ ca parṣadi dharman deśayema yathaitarhi tathāgato
S06pvspl_u:2_34_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣān daśadigabhyāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ ca devānām āśayaṃ viditvā sarvadharmāṇām
S06pvspl_u:2_35_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṅ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
S06pvspl_u:2_35_1: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocat ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya nāhetukan nāpratyayaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_35_2: buddhā bhagavanta smitam āviṣkurvanti evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocad etenānanda prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṇānutpattikeṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_35_3: dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā ete cānāgate 'dhvany aṣṭāṣaṣṭyā kalpakoṭibhir bodhyaṅgapuṣpanāmānas tathāgatā arhantas samyaksambuddhā
S06pvspl_u:2_36_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_36_1: prajñāpāramitām ārabhya dhārmikīṅ kathāṅ kartuṃ yathā bodhisatvā mahāsatvā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto niryāyur iti /
S06pvspl_u:2_37: / atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat* /
S06pvspl_u:2_38: / kin nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty uta buddhānubhāvena /
S06pvspl_u:2_39_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_39_1: cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat tat kiñcid āyuṣmañ cchāriputra bhagavataś śrāvakā bhāṣante
S06pvspl_u:2_39_2: deśayanty udīrayanti sarvas sa tathāgatasya puruṣākāro veditavyas taṅ kasya hetor yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyān
S06pvspl_u:2_39_3: dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavataś śrāvakās tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya yad yad eva bhāṣante
S06pvspl_u:2_39_4: deśayanty upadiśanti sarvan tad dharmatayā na viruddhyate tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputropāyakauśalyayogena bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_39_5: prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty aviṣayo 'trāyuṣmāñ cchāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06pvspl_u:2_40_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat* bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti bhagavann ucyate kasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_40_1: yad uta bodhisatva iti prajñāpāramiteti vā nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi (PvSPL gā_b) yad uta bodhisatva iti
S06pvspl_u:2_40_2: prajñāpāramiteti vā so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisatvam asamanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisatvaṃ katamasyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_41_0: / evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti
S06pvspl_u:2_41_1: tad api nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathā pi nāma subhūte satvas satva iti nāmnocyate na ca
S06pvspl_u:2_41_2: kadācit satvopalabdhir yac ca nāma tad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptir notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_42_0: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam ātmasatvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajanakapaśyakā
S06pvspl_u:2_42_1: iti subhūte sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketanamātreṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_42_2: vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti
S06pvspl_u:2_42_3: bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_42_4: vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam ādhyātmakaṃ rūpam
S06pvspl_u:2_42_5: iti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate
S06pvspl_u:2_42_6: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram
S06pvspl_u:2_42_7: etad tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:2_42_8: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti sarvam etan dharmaprajñaptimātran
S06pvspl_u:2_42_9: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:2_42_10: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate cakṣur iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
S06pvspl_u:2_42_11: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
S06pvspl_u:2_43_0: / evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho
S06pvspl_u:2_43_1: 'nyatra dharmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate rūpam iti subhūte
S06pvspl_u:2_43_2: dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma
S06pvspl_u:2_44: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyan dharma iti subhūte dharmapra
